channel.title: The old record box II
channel.description:
Musical and speaking selections played from cylinder records dated from the late 1890s to about 1929.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Indians
item.description: Blue Feather, Topeka, Tippecanoe, Snow Deer, Silver Star
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Sampler
item.description: Happy Birds, Where the Sunset turns the Ocean's Blue to Gold, Uncle Josh and the Ligtning Rod Agent, Dardanelle, Rockabye Your Baby
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Singalong
item.description: Sweet Genevieve, Sweet Adeline, Meet Me in St. Louis, Louis; Hail! Hail! The Gang's All Here, In the Shade of the Old Apple Tree, Missouri Waltz, Yes We Have No Bananas
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Something Different
item.description: Forgotten Melodies, Jere Sanford's Yodeling and Whistling Specialty, Marianina, Listen to the Mocking Bird, Josephine Polka
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Potpourri
item.description: Yankee Doodle, Sweet Little Daisies, I've Got Rings on My Fingers, Theodore, Silver Bell

item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Home Front
item.description: Let's All be Americans Now, Wake Up America, what Kind of an American Are You?, I Didn't Raise My Boy to be a Soldier, It's Time for Every Boy to be a Soldier, Don't Forget the Salvation Army
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: A Few More Favorites

item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Song and Patter
item.description: Flanagan at the Votal Teacher's, My Wife's Gone to the Country, No Wedding Bells for Me, Seated Around an Oil Stove, Oh Helen
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Love
item.description: The Longest Way Round is the Sweetest Way Home, Willie's Got Another Girl Now, Oh what a Pal was Mary, Row Row Row, She Forgot to Bring Him Back
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Poor Lost Souls
item.description: Casey Jones, The Death of Floyd Collins, The Drunkard's Lone Child

item.title: To the Ladies
item.description: Oh You Beautiful Doll, There's a Quaker Down in Quaker Town, When I Get You Alone Tonight, That Old Girl of Mine, When I Dream of Old Erin, The Sunshine of Your Smile

item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Sunday
item.description: Take Me Out to the Ball Game, He Goes to Church on Sunday, Revival Meeting at Punkin Center, Let the Lower Lights be Burning

item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.description: My Beautiful Lady, Erminie, When Love is Young in Springtime, Goodbye Girls I'm Through
